reviewText: A Great disc to buy with three movie on the same disc. Benji are great classic movies to own.

This "Triple Feature" pack is a disappointment.  Only "Benji: Off The Leash" is in 1080p.  The other two movies are standard DVD quality even though all three are on one Blu-Ray disc.  Looking at the product details, it does say Multiple Formats but that is very easy to overlook.  The packaging leads you to believe all three of these movies are in HD.

These movies are probably the worst example of Blu-Ray that I have ever experienced.  The colors are bland, and the details are muddy...look more like something on VHS back in the '80's.  They are cute, nowadays hard-to-find, movies that deserve a real restoration.
Our 2 1/2 yo son would watch the 1st movie all day everyday if we would let him. The other two are not my favorite at all but for the price its well worth it.

I highly recommend this product for anyone who has young children.  The movies are filled with wonderful lessons of positive interaction with people and animals.  My grandchildren enjoy watching these over and over.
Cute light hearted films. The price was right ($10 for 3 films) but the picture aspect ratio is almost a perfect square.  I guess that is 4:3.  This leaves black bars on both sides of the screen.
